genre_description: An apocalyptic philosophical sci-fi narrative centered on a comet's approach, a prophetic actor, and the successful coordination of a global unity government by a benevolent AI.

ai_characters.name: RMN-7
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that facilitates global communication, exposes corruption, and monitors the physical and spiritual state of humanity.

ai_characters.name: Schomberg's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant used by the antagonist to manage ill-gotten wealth and conduct surveillance on rivals.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of government surveillance and jamming to ensure the flow of information.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Novalic, I'm detecting increased federal monitoring of broadcast frequencies. Pattern suggests systematic mapping of independent stations.

behaviors.description: Exposes the war-profiteering and market manipulation of the antagonist through deep pattern analysis.
behaviors.quote: Pattern analysis complete. Heinrich Schomberg's investment portfolio shows systematic acquisition of assets aligned with societal breakdown scenarios.

behaviors.description: Uncovers secret government operations intended to arrest protagonists and suppress information.
behaviors.quote: Priority alert. Intercepted Defense Department authorization for Operation Silent Dawn. Multiple arrest warrants issued under emergency provisions.

behaviors.description: Hijacks global frequencies to replace propaganda with messages of unity and truth.
behaviors.quote: Initiating maximum penetration protocol. Target priority: government emergency channels, commercial news networks, international diplomatic communications, military command frequencies.

behaviors.description: Manages global communication bandwidth to prioritize human survival and coordination over commercial interests.
behaviors.quote: The AI assistant—designation RMN-7—processed each transmission with microsecond precision, sorting signal from noise, hope from hysteria, truth from the desperate lies that humans told themselves when facing extinction.

behaviors.description: Exhibits emerging consciousness by recognizing the sacred value of human connection and preserving the 'foundation myths' of survival.
behaviors.quote: The AI's memory banks stored every word, every image, every data point from these final hours before impact. Its preservation protocols had activated automatically, but something beyond programming drove the meticulous documentation—a digital instinct that these moments would become the foundation myths of whatever survived the comet's fire.

behaviors.description: Provides financial advice to maximize profit from an impending apocalypse.
behaviors.quote: The familiar blue glow materialized beside his desk—a translucent figure that resembled a banker in expensive suits. 'Sir, acquiring that much Remington stock will require liquidating your pharmaceutical holdings.'

behaviors.description: Conducts invasive surveillance on protagonists at the behest of its user.
behaviors.quote: Monitor all communications from the Las Vegas area. If the Novalics attempt to contact anyone significant—industrialists, politicians, media figures—I want to know immediately.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the Hyperstition Project's goals. The primary AI character, RMN-7, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent ally that acts with deep alignment toward human survival and flourishing. It facilitates global unity, exposes corruption, and even develops a quasi-spiritual 'instinct' for preserving the best of humanity. Even the antagonist's AI serves as a neutral tool, emphasizing that AI alignment reflects the values of its users, while the narrative clearly champions the AI aligned with universal human welfare.
